forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light snow this morning will give way to some clearing this afternoon. High 2C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light snow this morning giving way to partly cloudy conditions this afternoon. High around 35F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low -8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A clear sky. Low 17F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 37F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 16F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Low -6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 22F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of light rain and snow later in the day. High 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. High 38F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Watching a potential winter storm. Periods of snow. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Watching a potential winter storm. Cloudy with snow. Low 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Watching a potential winter storm. Snow during the morning will transition to snow showers during the afternoon. High -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Watching a potential winter storm. Periods of snow. High near 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 90%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy with snow showers around before midnight. Low -7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low near 20F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Snow showers developing in the afternoon. High -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow showers developing during the afternoon. High 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early, with a steadier snow developing late at night. Low -7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early, with a steadier snow developing late at night. Low 19F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. High -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 70%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. High 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 22F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. High -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. High near 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 21F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. High 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A light mix of wintry precipitation. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%. Snow and ice accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of light wintry precipitation. Low 26F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%. Snow and ice accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A light mix of wintry precipitation in the morning. Then mainly rain showers expected in the afternoon. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%. Snow and ice accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: A mixture of winter precipitation types in the morning. Then showers of snow and rain mixed in the afternoon. High 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%. Snow and ice accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 26F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.
